__e: She asked me for a drink, but I lied and told her we didn't have any.
So, either he was lying when he said he only had car fare, or...
it wasn't true what he told you about my killing your father.
He didn't have to carry me and lie and make me think I was better than I was.
First you lied on your dating application... then you lied on hilary's résumé.
It was Dominguez who first lied to you about plastics.
And if it was Otis, he's gotta be lying about not recognizing Koblin.
A man who has lied about everything and now wants to be taken at his word.
In all else I've been an impostor, but not in that.
Looks like the only thing you didn't lie about is your marriage.
You falsely spoke of what you saw.
In all else I've been an impostor, but not in that.
I lied about what I knew, and then I lied about what I did not know.
I know you lied about the dream.
But I didn't lie about the rest.
Just Like He Lied About Everything Else.
Admit that you lied, fuck me at the door.
She may have been lying to protect me.
I told you I was married to protect myself.
But I didn't lie about the rest.
You knew a ballet like that comes along once in a career, and you wanted it. Real bad. So you lied to make sure you got what you wanted.
For once your father didn't lie. - You are lovely!
You lied about your friend here.
Besides, you did lie about everything.
Look, I haven't lied about anything.
You know something? Our friend, the professor, lied to the police.
Did you tell the police a load of bullshit, then?
All these years I've lied to you both.
He says I lied to everyone, including you.
This girl... who sent our men the wrong way... she must have brought vegetables at your place many times before.
I know that you caught him in a lie, and I know that's enough for me.
I lied, and told them that you were.
She told me she was your palsie-walsie, and then she eat me out of the house, and...
Her stepfather's dead. I lied to her about the money.
What they said about your dad is wrong.
Or did you tell him a few lies about his wife?
What they said about your dad is wrong.
He lied to the king, the village, your mother, and you.
Or did you tell him a few lies about his wife?
